use_case: Creating a new order from the dashboard

steps.description: Log in to the ShypBUDDY Dashboard.
From the Dashboard, click on the 'Create Order' button.
Select 'Single Order Creation' from the available options.
Choose the pickup address and return-to-origin (RTO) address for the shipment.
Input the recipient's name, phone number, and delivery address.
Provide package contents, weight, and dimensions (length, breadth, height).
Choose between Prepaid or Cash on Delivery (COD).
Choose the desired courier partner from the available list.
Click the 'Ship' button to finalize and process the order.
